attributes.additional_details:
Speed bumps are costing the motorists dearly in repairs to suspension and steering and can also effect peoples health. People with back and neck problems in particular. The only people who benefit are the garage owners.
The bumps are not always visible due to parked vehicles and poor sign posts.
Drivers trying to straddle them are force towards on coming traffic and if it is a large vehicle it forces them to a halt.
More should be spent repairing the roads instead of installing what can only be described as pyramids.
